amendment.description: To expand the scope of use of amounts appropriated for hurricane disaster relief and recovery to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for Operations, Research, and Facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3648 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3648 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S3568, S3632; text: CR S3568; text as modified: CR S3632) To expand the scope of use of amounts appropriated for hurricane disaster relief and recovery to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for Operations, Research, and Facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3648 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3648 proposed by Senator Vitter.
